definition[0]: the 18th letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: used to describe a film that has been officially approved as only suitable for people over 17
definition[2]: the written abbreviation of Republican, used after a politician’s name to show that he or she belongs to the Republican Party in the US
definition[3]: the written abbreviation of regina (=queen), used after the name of the queen of the United Kingdom
definition[4]: the written abbreviation of river, used especially on maps
